item.title: Custom GTM Loader For Server-side Tagging
item.description: Important! I really do not recommend using this in production. The only proper way of loading Google scripts from server-side Google Tag Manager containers is to use the official Web Container Client. This template was introduced at a time when the script loading mechanism in server-side Google Tag Manager wasn’t as complex as it was today, and I also noticed that most people use templates like these to avoid ad blockers, which is not something I condone.
